page.title: 14SOCIAL EVENTS THEDDINGWORTH
page.content: The{Football Club}has two teams, under 12's and under 14's. The{Gardening {Club}has 3 open meetings, an outing and a show. An important social event is the{Garden Show,}with strong support for fruit, vegetable, cake, preserve, handcraft, flower arrangement and children's classes. A{ {Garden Fete}is held in the grounds of one of the houses & an{Autumn Bazaar} in the Village Hall, proceeds to Church funds. Produce from {Harvest Festivals }is sold for Church and Chapel funds. A {Mother and {Toddler Group }meets weekly and has 8 members and 14 toddlers. Fortnightly meetings of the {Whist Club }attracts 30 people; proceeds to the Village Hall. The {W.I. }with 25 members, has monthly meetings with guest speaker. Outings & other events are organised. There is a small handcraft group.
